member.name: T:OsTicket.API.APIProxy
member.summary: The OSTicket API Wrapper

member.name: M:OsTicket.API.APIProxy.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Construct an instance of the API Proxy class
member.param: The base URL of the OsTicket instance (minus the /api part)
The API Key that was generated by the OsTicket instance.

member.name: M:OsTicket.API.APIProxy.GetPriorities
member.summary: Retrieve a list of priorities from the OsTicket instance
member.returns: A value to string dictionary of all publicly available priorities in the OsTicket instance
member.remarks: Requires that the Priority.php API extension method be installed on the OsTicket instance

member.name: M:OsTicket.API.APIProxy.GetTopics
member.summary: Retrieve a list of help topics from the OsTicket instance
member.returns: A value to string dictionary of all publicly available help topics in the OsTicket instance
member.remarks: Requires that the Topic.php API extension method be installed on the OsTicket instance

member.name: M:OsTicket.API.APIProxy.SubmitTicket(OsTicket.API.Ticket)
member.summary: Submits a ticket to the OsTicket instance.

member.name: P:OsTicket.API.APIProxy.OsTicketUrl
member.summary: The Root URL of the OsTicket instance (http://support.blah.com, not http://support.blah.com/api)

member.name: P:OsTicket.API.APIProxy.ApiKey
member.summary: The API Key generated by OsTicket

member.name: T:OsTicket.API.Attachment
member.summary: Represents an Attachment in the OsTicket system

member.name: P:OsTicket.API.Attachment.Name
member.summary: The Filename of the Attachment

member.name: P:OsTicket.API.Attachment.Type
member.summary: The Content MIME Type of the Attachment

member.name: P:OsTicket.API.Attachment.Content
member.summary: The actual byte content of the Attachment

member.name: T:RestSharp.Serializers.NetwonsoftJsonSerializer
member.summary: Default JSON serializer for request bodies Doesn't currently use the SerializeAs attribute, defers to Newtonsoft's attributes

member.name: M:RestSharp.Serializers.NetwonsoftJsonSerializer.#ctor
member.summary: Default serializer

member.name: M:RestSharp.Serializers.NetwonsoftJsonSerializer.#ctor(Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializer)
member.summary: Default serializer with overload for allowing custom Json.NET settings

member.name: M:RestSharp.Serializers.NetwonsoftJsonSerializer.Serialize(System.Object)
member.summary: Serialize the object as JSON

member.name: P:RestSharp.Serializers.NetwonsoftJsonSerializer.DateFormat
member.summary: Unused for JSON Serialization

member.name: P:RestSharp.Serializers.NetwonsoftJsonSerializer.RootElement
member.summary: Unused for JSON Serialization

member.name: P:RestSharp.Serializers.NetwonsoftJsonSerializer.Namespace
member.summary: Unused for JSON Serialization

member.name: P:RestSharp.Serializers.NetwonsoftJsonSerializer.ContentType
member.summary: Content type for serialized content

member.name: T:OsTicket.API.Ticket
member.summary: Represents a Ticket in the OsTicket system

member.name: M:OsTicket.API.Ticket.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs a new Ticket

member.name: P:OsTicket.API.Ticket.Email
member.summary: The e-mail address of the user submitting the ticket. This value must parse into an e-mail address otherwise OsTicket will throw an exception on submission

member.name: P:OsTicket.API.Ticket.Name
member.summary: The name of the user submitting the ticket.

member.name: P:OsTicket.API.Ticket.Subject
member.summary: A summary of the issue that the user is facing

member.name: P:OsTicket.API.Ticket.Message
member.summary: A description of the issue that the user is facing. If IsMessageHtml is true, then this field is treated as HTML

member.name: P:OsTicket.API.Ticket.IsMessageHtml
member.summary: Whether or not to treat the Message property as an HTML fragment or plain text. By default, it is treated as Plain Text.

member.name: P:OsTicket.API.Ticket.IPAddress
member.summary: The IP Address of the user sending the message. While this is not a required property, OsTicket can be configured to blacklist users based on their IP Address.

member.name: P:OsTicket.API.Ticket.TopicId
member.summary: The Help Topic Id of the Ticket.
member.remarks: OsTicket does not expose this value by default, but it can be found via inspection of the HTML or via the API extensions provided by this library.

member.name: P:OsTicket.API.Ticket.PriorityId
member.summary: The Priority Id of the Ticket
member.remarks: OsTicket does not expose this value by default, but it can be found via inspection of the HTML or via the API extensions provided by this library.

member.name: P:OsTicket.API.Ticket.Attachments
member.summary: The list of attachments to add to this Ticket

member.name: P:OsTicket.API.Ticket.ExtraFields
member.summary: The list of extra fields to populate with this ticket. The keys are specified in the OsTicket UI
